snippet: DRAPKIN--Donald. The Englewood Hospital and Medical Center (EHMC) community mourns the passing of Donald Drapkin, our friend and benefactor. Mr. Drapkin was a strong supporter of not only our medical center, but our larger community. We extend our deepest condolences to the Drapkin family. Thomas C. Senter, Esq., Chairman, Englewood Healthcare System and EHMC Jay C. Nadel, Chairman, EHMC Foundation Warren Geller, President and CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: DRAPKIN--Donald. The Englewood Hospital and Medical Center (EHMC) community mourns the passing of Donald Drapkin, our friend and benefactor. Mr. Drapkin was a strong supporter of not only our medical center, but our larger community. We extend our deepest condolences to the Drapkin family. Thomas C. Senter, Esq., Chairman, Englewood Healthcare System and EHMC Jay C. Nadel, Chairman, EHMC Foundation Warren Geller, President and CEO 1/3
